text:
Answer:
Variance of EPS for Ron's Stores is:
o? EPs = 0.10 (1.80 – 1.28)2 + 0.20 (1.60 - 1.28)2 + 0.40 (1.20 – 1.28)2
+ 0.30 (1.00 – 1.28)2 = 0.0736
The standard deviation of EPS for Ron's Stores is:
Oeps = (0.0736)1/2 = 0.27
Note that the units of standard deviation are the same as that of EPS, so we would say
that the standard deviation of EPS for Ron's Stores is £0.27.
